name: Shop Heroes Legends
description:
Do you have what it takes to go from rags to riches and become the ultimate shopkeeper? Equip and command mighty heroes to emerge victorious in battle against epic bosses lurking in the treacherous dungeons of Aragonia and carve your name in history as the top ranked shop hero! Immerse yourself in a Simulation Tycoon RPG like no other, where you are no longer the hero protagonist but rather the friendly neighborhood shopkeeper that will ultimately determines each heroes’ fate.


Recruit a team of epic heroes to slay a titan, quest for loot, and even challenge other shopkeepers in the arena by equipping your heroes with the finest crafted gear. Team up with other players – suppliers, merchants & builders alike, across 100+ countries to form the most renowned city across all of civilization and claim your spot in history together!

What are you waiting for? Install Shop Heroes Legends for FREE to design, craft, build and quest your way to the top of the charts and emerge as the most renowned shop tycoon across all of Aragonia!


~~~~~~~~~
BECOME A MASTER SHOPKEEPER
~~~~~~~~~
◆ CREATE and DESIGN your fantasy item shop with endless possibilities
◆ CRAFT and FUSE powerful items to sell to visiting adventurers
◆ TRADE with other shopkeepers to build your fame and wealth
◆ CUSTOMIZE your shopkeeper avatar to express your own style

~~~~~~~~~
EXPERIENCE AN EXCITING ADVENTURE
~~~~~~~~~
◆ RECRUIT and equip mighty heroes, each with their own unique abilities
◆ COLLECT epic loot across time limited dungeons and themed events
◆ TEAM UP with your friends or make new ones to build a prosperous city
◆ BATTLE bosses and slay titans together to amass fame and fortune


Dominate the market and achieve economies of scale within your vertical to become a medieval fantasy shop tycoon! Craft, fuse, build and trade your way to achieve great fame and fortune. Turn your run down item shop into a booming cash cow while growing your reputation and business through your own strategy and hard work. Trade, sell or auction your crafted merchandise to the highest bidding shopkeeper from around the world or mark up prices by surcharging the rush of customers for some quick cash flow.

Design your store home to maximize foot traffic and attract as many paying customers as possible. As your shop and reputation grows, famed heroes will start visiting your shop regularly. Build a relationship with these heroes to unlock their unique quest chains and recruit them to challenge titans and other players in the arena. Manage your store effectively to become the top ranked shopkeeper in this medieval fantasy kingdom and mark your spot in history while amassing fame and fortune! Unleash your imagination and style by customizing your shopkeeper avatar. Choose from different types of clothing, hairstyles, facial features, accessories and more to create your unique avatar and show it off against friends & foes to compete for rewards and fame.

All of these adventures and more awaits you–join the millions of players that have already made Shop Heroes Legends their home. Prepare yourself for endless adventure as Aragonia anticipates your awakening!


~~~~~~~~
SUPPORT
~~~~~~~~
Experiencing any problems? Got some suggestions? We would love to hear from you! You can reach us at https://cloudcade.helpshift.com for immediate assistance.

A persistent network connection is required to play.

PLEASE NOTE! Shop Heroes Legends is completely free to play, but you can purchase some game items with real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, you can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings.
